text: Cygnet Health Care is a private provider of mental health services in the United Kingdom. Universal Health Services, a big American company, bought it in 2014. In 2022 its income was about £551 million. Earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortisation were about £48 million. Almost all the income comes from the NHS or local authorities. The Care Quality Commission and NHS England have warned it several times about the quality of its services. ==References== Category:Medical and health organisations in the United Kingdom Category:Psychiatry
title: Cygnet Health Care
